title: Essential Enki Bilal - Memories [CBR]
description:
Essential Enki Bilal - Memories [CBR]

From back of book:

THE EVOLLUTION OF AN ARTIST

ENKI BILAL WAS BORN IN YUGOSLAVIA, AND, AS A YOUNG CHILD, MOVED TO PARIS WHERE HE WENT ON TO BECOME ONE OF THE WORLDÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S MOST TALENTED GRAPHIC ARTISTS. BILALÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S GRAPHIC NOVELS HAVE BEEN PUBLISHED IN MORE THAN FIFTEEN LANGUAGES AROUND THE WORLD, AND ARE ALL BEST SELLERS.

MEMORIES COLLECTS BILALÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S TWO GRAPHIC NOVELS "MEMORIES OF OUTER SPACE" AND "MEMORIES OF OTHER TIMES" INTO ONE DELUXE TRADE PAPERBACK. THESE SCIENCE FICTION STORIES SHOWCASE HIS EARLY CAREER FROM 1972 TO 1981 AS HIS STYLE AND VOICE EVOLVED AND HE WENT FROM FLEDGLING ARTIST TOINTERNATIONAL SUPERSTAR.

COLLABORATING WITH A NUMBER OF WRITERS, INCLUDING JEAN-PIERRE DIONNET (EXTERMINATOR 17, METAL
HURLANT), BILAL WRITES AND ILLUSTRATES A SERIES OF SHORT STORIES THAT DEPICTS SURREAL AND FANTASTIC
WORLDS WITH A SCI-FI TWIST.

FANS OF BILALÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S WORK ON THE NIKOPOL TRILOGY, TOWNSCAPES, THE BEAST TRILOGY AND HIS OTHER HUMANOIDS/DC COMICS TRADE PAPERBACKS, WILL ENJOY THIS VERY DIVERSE AND INSIGHTFUL GATHERING OF BILALÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢S EARLIER WORKS.

Credits:

MAXIMILIEN CHAILLEUX AND FABRICE GIGER, EDITORS, ORIGINAL EDITION

(Sorry bout the CAPITALS, thats just how it's printed in the book - did'nt have the patience to edit it out. Proof-reading ocr results is tedious enough as is)
